ApplicationCreated(address,address,bytes.details: MUST be triggered on a successful call to `newApplication`.

calculateApplicationAddress(address,addr.details: Beware that only the `newApplication` function with the `salt` parameter      is able to deterministically deploy an application.

params.salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the application contract address

newApplication(address,address,bytes32).details: On success, MUST emit an `ApplicationCreated` event.Reverts if the application owner address is zero.

newApplication(address,address,bytes32,b.details: On success, MUST emit an `ApplicationCreated` event.Reverts if the application owner address is zero.

params.salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the application contract address

calculateApplicationAddress(address,addr.notice: Calculate the address of an application contract to be deployed deterministically.

userdoc.notice: Allows anyone to reliably deploy a new `IApplication` contract.
